creator: C.J.R.van.der.Oord@Coord.nl
text:
I tried running apache under Windows 2003 Server, but once in while downloaded 
files get corrupted. My feeling is that Windows 2003 Server suffers from the 
same bug as was initially reported for XP 
(http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;EN-US;q317949).

creator: chip@force-elite.com
text:
Can you please try the ideas at:
http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/binaries/win32/#problems

creator: C.J.R.van.der.Oord@Coord.nl
text:
The problem disappeared. I suspect that the hardware router was the source of 
the problems.
